artist: Author: Sascha Scatter; Author: Ashley McNamara; Artist: The Icarus Project , Spring Glan, N.Y.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of winged figure in barren landscape with text and expressionist designs printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 76 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Navigating the Space between Brilliance and Madness: A Reader & Roadmap of Bipolar Worlds
